thread.title: Gallbladder pain forces Placido Domingo to cancel some gigs
thread.title_full: Gallbladder pain forces Placido Domingo to cancel some gigs

title: Gallbladder pain forces Placido Domingo to cancel some gigs
text: > Entertainment Gallbladder pain forces Placido Domingo to cancel some gigs FILE - In this Sept. 30, 2014 file photo, Placido Domingo performs on stage at the Roundhouse in Camden, North London, as he closes this year's iTunes festival. The Metropolitan Opera said Wednesday, Oct. 14, 2015, that Domingo was admitted to the hospital with inflammation and will undergo gallbladder removal next week.He is expected to make a full recovery in time to conduct the performance on Nov. 2, as well as performances for which he was originally scheduled on Nov. 6, 11, and 14. (Photo by Joel Ryan/Invision/AP, File)
